G

Game - Interface in api
Interface for a Tetris-like game.
GAME_OVER - Enum constant in enum class api.GameStatus
 
GameMain - Class in ui
Main class for a GUI for a Tetris-type game sets up a GamePanel instance in a frame.
GameMain() - Constructor for class ui.GameMain
 
gameOver() - Method in class api.AbstractGame
 
gameOver() - Method in interface api.Game
Determines whether the game is over, which occurs when a new piece in its initial position collides with occupied cells of the grid.
GamePanel - Class in ui
User interface for the main grid of a Tetris-like game.
GamePanel(Game, ScorePanel, PreviewPanel, PlayLevel) - Constructor for class ui.GamePanel
Constructs a GamePanel with the given game and play level.
GameStatus - Enum Class in api
Status values for a Tetris-like game.
Generator - Interface in api
Abstraction of a generator for game pieces in a Tetris-like video game.

Returns a deep copy of the Cell objects in this piece.
